SEARCH
Package org.application.sessions

Interface ISessionsService

All Known Implementing Classes:
SessionsService
public interface ISessionsService
Represents a service interface for managing Session entities. This interface defines the service operations that can be performed, specific to session service.

  • Method Details

    • addSession

      Session addSession(Session.Type type, String halfYear, String disciplineName) throws SessionAdditionException, DisciplineNotFoundException, ValidationException
      Adds a new Session with the given type, half year and discipline name.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the new Session.
      halfYear - The half year of the new Session.
      disciplineName - The discipline name of the new Session.
      Returns:
      The newly created Session.
      Throws:
      SessionAdditionException - If the Session could not be added.
      DisciplineNotFoundException - If the Discipline with the given name was not found.
      ValidationException - If the provided type, half year or discipline name are invalid.

    • deleteSession

      boolean deleteSession(int sessionId) throws SessionNotFoundException, SessionDeletionFailed, ValidationException
      Deletes a Session with the given id.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The id of the Session to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the Session was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SessionNotFoundException - If the Session with the given id was not found.
      SessionDeletionFailed - If the Session could not be deleted.
      ValidationException - If the provided id is invalid.

    • deleteSession

      boolean deleteSession(String disciplineName) throws DisciplineNotFoundException, SessionNotFoundException, SessionDeletionFailed
      Deletes a Session with the given discipline name.
      Parameters:
      disciplineName - The discipline name of the Session to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the Session was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DisciplineNotFoundException - If the Discipline with the given name was not found.
      SessionNotFoundException - If the Session with the given discipline name was not found.
      SessionDeletionFailed - If the Session could not be deleted.

    • deleteAll

      boolean deleteAll() throws SessionDeletionFailed
      Deletes all Session entities.
      Returns:
      True if all Session entities were deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SessionDeletionFailed - If the Session entities could not be deleted.

    • getSessionById

      Session getSessionById(int SessionId) throws SessionNotFoundException, ValidationException
      Retrieves a Session by its ID.
      Parameters:
      SessionId - The ID of the Session to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Session with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      SessionNotFoundException - If the Session with the given ID was not found.
      ValidationException - If the provided id is invalid.

    • getSessions

      List<Session> getSessions()
      Retrieves all Session entities.
      Returns:
      A list of all Session entities.

    • getSessionsByHalfYear

      List<Session> getSessionsByHalfYear(String hf) throws SessionNotFoundException, ValidationException
      Retrieves all Session entities with the given half year.
      Parameters:
      hf - The half year of the Session entities to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of all Session entities with the given half year.
      Throws:
      SessionNotFoundException - If the Session with the given half year was not found.
      ValidationException - If the provided half year is invalid.

    • addTeacherToSession

      Session addTeacherToSession(String disciplineName, String teacherName) throws DisciplineNotFoundException, SessionNotFoundException, TeacherNotFoundException
      Adds a teacher to a session.
      Parameters:
      disciplineName - The discipline name of the session.
      teacherName - The name of the teacher.
      Returns:
      The session with the added teacher.
      Throws:
      DisciplineNotFoundException - If the discipline was not found.
      SessionNotFoundException - If the session was not found.
      TeacherNotFoundException - If the teacher was not found.

    • addTeacherToSession

      Session addTeacherToSession(int sessionId, String teacherName) throws SessionNotFoundException, TeacherNotFoundException
      Adds a teacher to a session.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The id of the session.
      teacherName - The name of the teacher.
      Returns:
      The session with the added teacher.
      Throws:
      SessionNotFoundException - If the session was not found.
      TeacherNotFoundException - If the teacher was not found.

    • addGroupToSession

      Session addGroupToSession(String disciplineName, String groupName) throws StudentGroupNotFoundException, DisciplineNotFoundException, SessionNotFoundException
      Adds a group to a session.
      Parameters:
      disciplineName - The discipline name of the session.
      groupName - The name of the group.
      Returns:
      The session with the added group.
      Throws:
      StudentGroupNotFoundException - If the group was not found.
      DisciplineNotFoundException - If the discipline was not found.
      SessionNotFoundException - If the session was not found.

    • addGroupToSession

      Session addGroupToSession(int sessionId, String groupName) throws SessionNotFoundException, StudentGroupNotFoundException
      Adds a group to a session.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The id of the session.
      groupName - The name of the group.
      Returns:
      The session with the added group.
      Throws:
      SessionNotFoundException - If the session was not found.
      StudentGroupNotFoundException - If the group was not found.
